name: 2nd International Conference on Teaching and Education
content: We are delighted to invite educators, researchers, and professionals to the 2nd International Conference on Teaching and Education, taking place in the vibrant city of Manchester, United Kingdom, from 26 â€“ 28 February 2025\. Join us for this prestigious event to explore the latest advancements and innovations in the field of teaching and education. Conference Topics: The conference will feature a wide array of topics, including but not limited to: Education Theory and Practice Child and Family Education Learning Strategies and Innovations And many more. Submission and Review Process: We welcome the submission of abstracts that will undergo a meticulous review by our esteemed Scientific Committee. This rigorous process ensures that all accepted submissions meet the highest standards of academic excellence and relevance, showcasing impactful and original research. Presentation Formats: To accommodate diverse preferences and methods of knowledge sharing, the conference offers various presentation formats: Virtual Presentations: Enabling researchers to present their work remotely. Oral Presentations: Providing a platform for comprehensive and interactive presentations. Poster Presentations: Allowing for visual and engaging displays of research. Publication Opportunities: Accepted papers will have the opportunity to be published in a selection of esteemed journals and conference proceedings, significantly enhancing the visibility and impact of the research presented. Additional Benefits: Invitation Letter: Participants attending in person will receive a complimentary invitation letter to assist with visa applications. City Tour: Enjoy a complimentary guided tour of Manchester, offering an opportunity to explore the rich culture and iconic landmarks of the host city. We look forward to welcoming you to Manchester for an inspiring and enriching conference experience.
